headline: Watch Ross Stores, Inc. (ROST) For Value, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 8 Stocks Jim Cramer Discussed As He Dismissed Value Stocks. Ross Stores, Inc. (NASDAQ:ROST) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Ross Stores, Inc. (NASDAQ:ROST)’s stock has not, unlike its peers, benefited from growing spending at off-price retailers as Americans grow tired of consistent inflation. Its shares have lost 1.2% […]

headline: ZUMZ Stock Gains 15% on Narrower-Than-Expected Q2 Loss, Comps Rise Y/Y
summary: Zumiez jumps 15% after Q2 sales beat expectations, comps grow for the fifth quarter, and losses come in narrower than expected.

headline: Jim Cramer Believes The TJX Companies (TJX) Is Offering Great Value to Consumers

(NYSE:TJX)’s shares have gained 14% year-to-date, they have still lagged other off-price retailers. Some of the sluggishness is due to the impact of tariffs on the […]

headline: 2 Reasons to Like TJX and 1 to Stay Skeptical
summary: TJX has followed the market’s trajectory closely, rising in tandem with the S&P 500 over the past six months. The stock has climbed by 14.7% to $141.11 per share while the index has gained 11.3%.
